REMARKS_TEXT: Want to hire me for freelance, teaching, or assignments? Feel free to contact me. We can discuss the price ^_^
FULL_INTRO_TEXT:
Heyy, the name's Muhammad Firdaus. I am an Information Technology Student in the Artificial Intelligence (Deep Learning) field and a part-time Senior IT Trainer.

I used to be the manager for the Web and Electronics & Robotics Department in Kidocode when there were departments instilled in Kidocode.

I am also a freelance Senior Developer for Mididle Sdn. Bhd.

I also teach on YouTube through my tutorial channel as a VTuber here!

As of now, I am the co-founder of the group (soon to be company) of Janggut KawKaw (Name subject to change) where we make applications that are mostly Islamic themed!

I also love sports like football. Be sure to call me if you want a match >.<. Also a major Fire Emblem fan. I also make some playthroughs on my YouTube channel!

I also made some personal projects, but most of them are for fun. My main dream is to be a game programmer or a teacher/lecturer. At the same time, I write some stories during my free time.

As shown above, my skills mostly revolve around teaching and programming. There are some programming languages that I have not mastered yet, but I have basic knowledge of and can still help you with. If you ever feel the need for a freelancer for a project or assignment, don't hesitate to contact me!

This website is made using Angular 11, implements the ng-zorro framework, and is hosted using AWS.
CONTACT_HEADING: Want to contact me for a freelance job or collaboration, or just to extend our network / be friends?

ASHABAL_DESC1: A childhood friend and collaborator for doing online classes.
AFIQ_DESC1: A childhood friend and probably future collaborator for doing online classes.
PUBLICATIONS_DESC: This is a published Systematic Literature Review of my research in the detection and tracking of people in dense crowds through deep learning approach.
STORIES_ONESHOT_DESC: The story is about me, who is tired from doing assignments, and trying to fall asleep. I fail to do so and thought it was a great idea to tire my eyes out from watching some TV. Then, I found this interesting show called Angel vs Demon and checked it out. What happened next made me regret turning on that channel.
PROJECT_TITLE: This is a list of some of the projects I created. You can find more of my projects in my Github and LinkedIn that is linked in the Contacts tab
PNC_TECH: Raspberry Pi, Python, Telegram bot (Telepot library), MySQL
PNC_DESC:
• Tracking device for pets and kids
  • Uses Raspberry Pi and its own telegram bot to communicate with it
  • Can be used to get the tracker's location, set a safe zone for the tracker where if it leaves the zone, the person's telegram bot will be spammed with the tracker's last location
  • The person can also ring a buzzer from the telegram bot and access emergency contacts saved through the telegram bot.
  • GitHub Code Here!
WWMU_TITLE: Personal Project, you can search it on telegram by finding its username - @WorkWakeMeUpPlsbot
WWMU_TECH: Python, MongoDB, Telegram bot (Telepot library), Heroku
WWMU_DESC:
• Telegram bot that act as alarm clock to wake people up
  • To stop the alarm, the user needs to answer the given mathematical question, making it hard to snooze
  • Can also include with a creepy image to make sure the person don't go back to sleep (False by default)
  • GitHub Code Here!
INPT_DESC:
• Python package to help simplify the use of inputs with data types
  • Package and Tutorial Here!
QBOT_TITLE: Competition / Personal Project, you can search it on telegram by finding its username - @QadhaaBot
QBOT_TECH: Python, Telegram bot (Telepot library), MongoDB, Heroku
QBOT_DESC:
• Telegram bot created to keep track of Islamic prayers missed so that it will be easier to be reminded to replace them.
  • Can also choose to send a prayer (Doa/Dua) and Islamic quotes everyday at 8AM and 9PM using the Singapore Timezone
  • GitHub Code Here!
  • User Guide Here!
KGAME_TITLE: Personal Project - To introduce new people to Kidocode's Web Department (2021-2024)
KGAME_DESC:
• Play through a visual novel to introduce yourself to Kidocode's Web Department's Managers (2021-2024)
  • Done using RenPy, and hosted on itch.io for free
  • Have a secret ending hehehe
  • Play the Game Here!
J_TITLE: Personal Project - Fire Emblem 4 / 5 Based Wordle
J_DESC:
• Fire Emblem 4 / 5 based Wordle (inspiration from Doopu - Solkatti)
  • Using HTML, CSS, JS, and hosted via GitHub pages
  • Done for fun, used ChatGPT for help on this
  • Included a feedback form
  • Play the Game Here!
DIPLOMA: Diploma of Engineering Technology in Computing
DIPLOMA_Q_1:
• CGPA - 3.41
  • Campus Level - Member of UniKL MIIT E-Sport Club (2017, 2018)
  • Campus Level - Member of UniKL MIIT Ganbatte Club (2016, 2017, 2018)
  • Campus Level - Event Committee of Haru Matsuri - Spring Festival (2017)
D_INTERN_W_1:
• Gained knowledge on Python, MIT App Inventor, HTML, JavaScript and extra knowledge on Arduino
  • Sharpen soft skills.
  • Widen networking.
  • Gained passion in teaching.
BACHELOR: Bachelor of Engineering Technology In Computer Systems with Honours
BACHELOR_Q_1:
• CGPA - 3.56
  • Campus Level - Member of UniKL MIIT Computer Engineering Club (2018)
  • Campus Level - Event Committee of Python Workshop by Kidocode (2019)
  • International Level - Event Committee of Network Security Transformation (2019)
  • Campus Level - Participant of Mini Fundraising for Technoculture Festival 2018 (2018)
  • Campus Level - Event Manager of Awareness about the New Norm Practice (2020)
  • National Level - Event Committee of Iftar@Kuala Lumpur 2019 (2019)
K_DESC_1:
• Have experience in being a supervisor to over 30 interns.
  • Also have experienced in being a supervisor to 9 interns at the same time.
  • Helped to coach students in the given syllabus
  • Create syllabus especially for web and electronic courses for kids to teenagers
  • Also have experience teaching special students and early age students.
  • Handled language barrier students who can only speak Malay and Japanese
  • Coached students in advanced courses such as CSS, JS, Java, cybersecurity, PhaserJS, Kaboom JS, Lua, 3D printing, business, advanced electronics (direct circuits and logic gates), and robotics.
  • Coached students and interns for projects, including creating and hosting their portfolio using web development.
  • Interviewed over 40 people who wanted to join Kidocode as an intern
  • Hosted and observed internal workshops. Collaborated with UniKL and IEEE to make a workshop online with UniKL about Internet of Things and NodeMCU and also to make an Arduino workshop at SMK Kiaramas.
  • Hosted and observed internal workshops under web, electronics, robotics, and 3D departments.
  • Collaborated with MSU as a judge for their FYP students’ projects under iRex, served as a panelist for their internship panel, and delivered a motivational talk for their dean’s list students preparing for internships, leading to Kidocode signing an MOU with MSU.
  • Collaborated with MSU students to conduct a workshop about ESP and IoT using simulation.
  • Conducted an electronics workshop with Monash University for their Women’s Engineering Club.
  • Become am external assessor for Computer Engineering students' Final Year Project in UniKL MIIT
B_DESC_1:
• Helped in a team to develop government agecies' websites.
  • Learn Angular, NG-Zorro and the Agile framework.
  • Got introduced to GitLab management and Microsoft Teams ticketing system.
MDRILL_DESC_1:
• Helped in two teams to help two different agencies.
  • Enhanced more on my Java skills here as well as Angular.
  • Learn about keycloak as well.
  • Helped to solve bug fixes and got more familiar with GitLab tickets and roles.
  • Had to meet with clients online to discuss milestones and progress.
MASTER_Q_1:
• Doing masters by research about dense crowd detection through deep learning approach.
  • Recipient of Excellent Research Grant Scheme (UERGS).
  • Published a Systematic Literature Review article on inforescom.org .
A_LEC_DATE: September 2023 - December 2024 (Grant ended, extended but awaiting new semester if called upon)
A_LECT_DESC_1:
• Teaching and guiding Bachelor students about Network Operating Systems (NOS) and projects including Arduino and ESP.
  • Under UERGS Grant and assisting lecturers with the lab segments of courses.
  • Involved with grading the students’ final projects for one of the courses as well as their exams.
  • Examiner for their practical exam.
PD_DESC_1:
• Assist to check for bugs, make some changes and deploy a system to NGINX for doctors to use.
  • Involved with the first pharmacogenomics conference in Malaysia by handing the microphone station.
  • Converted a Wordpress website to an e-commerce website using WooCommerce. Many people have bought from the website and during launch for a week, there has been a profit of RM9000 to the website.
  • Help to create scripts to pull, push and deploy code to the NGINX server for a smoother process.
MIDIDLE_DESC_1:
• Handle clients project, mainly as an overseer, middleman, and backend developer.
  • Sometimes stand in to talk with clients and convey messages to the operations team.
DIGNITY_DESC_1:
• Collaboration with Kidocode for teaching Kidocode courses to underpriveleged students.
  • Observe and guide them to using AI for answering questions and their projects.
  • Encourage students them to help each other to boost their soft skills.
